about_the_game:
This is an exciting top-down pinball challenge game with shooting as the core gameplay. In this challenge, you will control the ball to hit the small monsters filled with numbers on the screen. Each successful hit reduces the number until the monster disappears, and you will get points.

There are special elements in the game that can enhance your strength. Defeating monsters with a key mark will increase your attack power, making the ball more powerful. Additionally, defeating monsters with a ball mark will also increase the number of your balls, providing more opportunities for continuous shooting.

But be careful, the monsters will continue to attack. If they pass the bottom red line, the game will end. At the end of the game, you will receive a gold coin reward based on the points you have earned. Use these coins to purchase items to enhance your abilities, choose the right items to get higher scores in the game.

Collect enough keys to unlock beautiful CG images in the gallery. These images will record your achievements in the game and become your precious collection.

Are you ready for this pinball challenge? Enjoy the fun and achievements brought by shooting!

Minimum:
  • OS: window7/10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8250U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
